Title: Log Out after successful login
Steps:
1. Log in with valid username & password
2. Click Log out button in Navbar
Expected Result: User logged out → "Welcome ..." disappears, Sign up & Log in buttons reappear

Title: Try to access Cart after Log Out
Precondition: User logged in, then logged out
Steps:
1. Log in with valid username & password
2. Log out
3. Try to open Cart page from Navbar
Expected Result: System should block access to Cart (redirect to login / show error)
Actual Result: Actual: Cart page still opens normally after logout (Security Issue)

Title: Logout button should appear only after successful login
Steps:
1. Open the website
2. Check navigation bar for “Logout” button
Expected Result: Logout button should not be visible until the user logs in
Actual Result: Logout button appears only after login

Title: After logging out, user should not be able to return to the previous session
Steps:
1. Login with valid credentials
2. Click “Logout”
3. Press browser back button
Expected Result: User should remain logged out; cannot access previous pages
Actual Result: User stays logged out and redirected to Home

Title: Logout option should not be available before login
Steps:
1. Open website
2. Check if “Logout” option is displayed anywhere
Expected Result: Logout option should not appear before login
Actual Result: Logout option not displayed before login
